long_description: A fresh concoction from Oakley, the Blender Polarized Sunglasses for men are the perfect mix of performance and style for those who want the best. Revolutionary C-5 alloy is a fusion of 5 metal compounds with a barely-there feel. Farther down the earstems, stress-resistant O Matter(R) frame material takes over, with pads that grip even better when wet. Oakley high-definition polarized lenses block 99% of glare and 100% of harmful UV rays without haze or distortion. Made of super-durable polycarbonate, the lenses resist impact and offer 8.75-base lens curvature for peripheral vision and protection. Oakley Three-Point Fit holds lenses in precise optical alignment for comfort and performance. Adjustable nose pads on the Blender Polarized Sunglasses ensure a snug, secure fit.
short_description: A fresh concoction from Oakley, the Blender Polarized Sunglasses for men are the perfect mix of performance and style for those who want the best.
